item.title: about
item.description: Who Am I? Hi!, I’m Josué Márquez Navarro, a Software Engineer. I love… Coding Mountain Biking Fantastic/Sci-Fi reading Learn new things Things I do in my free time (some of them)… GitHub repos npm packages Docker images Maven Java artifacts Android Apps Experience February 2018 - Present / Back-End & DevOps Developer at Agave Lab in Guadalajara, MX. Currently working with microservices using technologies like:
